title: Philip Rivers-Chargers era comes to official end, Ranking teams with biggest Super Bowl windows (Football 2/11)
description:
It's a sad day for Pick Six host Will Brinson as the Chargers and Philip Rivers have officially parted ways. Will is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to the inevitable separation between franchise and quarterback, breaking down how the announcement was handled (4:30), what Los Angeles does next (17:30) and where Rivers could land in free agency (20:30). Next, the Pick Six Superfriends rank their Top 5 teams with the biggest Super Bowl windows (40:00).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @RyanWilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
